When I ring the @EnvAgency Emergency number and the person totally understands the terror ‚ò† that we live with in NUL from #walleysquarrey @StinkStopthe I have #HopeForTomorrow @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @DefraGovUK @AaronBell4NUL

It's like the police asking the suspect to go to the scene of crime and report back if they find any evidence against themselves.

urls.title: The River Lea is plagued by pollution ‚Äì it is no place for a swim | Letters
urls.description: Letters: Readers respond to a photo essay on bathers in the River Lea at Hackney Marshes in east London

tweets.text:
"We do know that local volunteers are pulling sanitary waste out of the river just upstream of 'Hackney Beach'." The reality of England's rivers.

And the @EnvAgency does what exactly?

https://t.co/rdKF8KpJFu

@swaledalebirds_ @Jack_Hirst3 @EnvAgencyYNE @SandTCUKYorks @WildTroutTrust @YorkDalesRT @baileyffmuk @ProfJGrey @PeteTurnerEA @MickC1954 Big changes in thinking & personnel. We've over 3km of fencing and renaturalisation of riverbank plus close to 4k trees in the last few years alone, much with @WildTroutTrust

urls.title: Japan to Announce Fukushima Water Release Into Sea Soon
urls.description: The Japanese government has decided to dispose of massive amounts of treated but still radioactive water stored in tanks at the wrecked Fukushima nuclear plant by releasing it into the Pacific Ocean, local media say, a conclusion widely expected but delayed for years amid protests and safety concerns.

urls.title: Making it easier to find registered waste carriers

tweets.text:
We're using technology to support waste carriers.

We‚Äôve developed a new online tool that makes it easier for customers to check if a waste carrier is registered with us.
